select count(1) from ( SELECT C.id, ba.area_name AS area_name,C.city_code, C.message_name, C.message_type, C.push_range, C.created_by, C.updated_by, C.CREATE_TIME, C.UPDATE_TIME,C.scale FROM (SELECT t.id, t.city_code, t.message_name, t.message_type, t.push_range, t.created_by, t.updated_by, t.CREATE_TIME, t.UPDATE_TIME, CASE WHEN B.scale != '' THEN B.scale ELSE 0 END scale FROM app_message t LEFT JOIN (SELECT A.message_id, FLOOR(ROUND(A.times / A.totalTimes, 2) * 100) AS scale FROM (SELECT * FROM (SELECT message_id, COUNT(1) times FROM app_user_message GROUP BY message_id ORDER BY create_time DESC) mc, (SELECT COUNT(1) totalTimes FROM app_user_message) aumc) A) B ON t.id = B.message_id) C, BASE_AREA ba where 1=1
and C.message_name like '%${messageName}%'
and C.city_code = #{cityCode}
and C.city_code LIKE '${userCityCode}%'
AND ba.flag!='DELETE' and C.city_code = ba.area_code ) a
